title: Wayang Kulit
creator_credit: Tom Hodge, Malayan Film Unit and Zain Hussain
brief_description: Shows a travelling troupe, the touring Wayang Kulit or shadow play men, in Malaya. Follows the troupe as it provides this traditional entertainment in the villages and kampongs of Malaya’s east coast.
creator_credit_for_label: Tom Hodge, Malayan Film Unit and Zain Hussain
